plot outline: Rishi and Aditi along with their son shift to a new house things are going well ,until Rishi becomes busy with his work and ignores his family.Rishi works late night and upon reaching home he hears strange sounds in his building.Things become worst when Rishi starts working on his new horror show to save his job as well as the channel.He spends very less time at home hardly few hours.Aditi fed up with this with her son reaches the sets of his horror show and asks for divorce.But that time a bigger situation arises as the family participating in his show backs out and at last moment.Rishi now decides to participate himself taking Aditi's help.But soon as he enters the haunted mansion a strange figure is waiting for him.
title: Aik
plot: This story is about an individual who conveniently believed that he loved his wife and his three year old son more than himself until he is trapped in something he had designed himself.

Rishi and Aditi along with their son shift to a new house things are going well ,until Rishi becomes busy with his work and ignores his family.Rishi works late night and upon reaching home he hears strange sounds in his building.Things become worst when Rishi starts working on his new horror show to save his job as well as the channel.He spends very less time at home hardly few hours.Aditi fed up with this with her son reaches the sets of his horror show and asks for divorce.But that time a bigger situation arises as the family participating in his show backs out and at last moment.Rishi now decides to participate himself taking Aditi's help.But soon as he enters the haunted mansion a strange figure is waiting for him.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
